UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the application, storing basic profile information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

email.description: The user's email address, used for identification and communication.

displayName.description: The user's display name or full name.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was last updated.

Tag.title: Tag
Tag.description: Represents a customizable tag for categorizing and prioritizing tasks.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tag entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the tag was created.

Period.title: Period
Period.description: Represents a user-defined time period or category for scheduling tasks (e.g., 'Today', 'This Week').

id.description: Unique identifier for the Period entity.

name.description: The name of the period (e.g., 'Today', 'This Week', 'Anytime').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the period was created.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task or a habit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

name.description: The name of the task or habit.

type.description: The type of task, either 'task' or 'habit'.

tags.description: References to Tags associated with this task. (Relationship: Tag N:N Task)

status.description: The current status of the task.

timeSpent.description: The total time spent on the task in seconds.

pomodoroSettings.description: Settings for the Pomodoro timer associated with this task.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated.
